manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Functional and Thoughtful Design Luggage Cart Sturdy, light-weight construction opens and closes in seconds providing easy maneuverability. Oversized rugged wheels for improved handling. Adjustable support strap anchors baggage and prevents shifting. Support strap stretches to almost double its length to hold lots of different size loads. Safely transports luggage, boxes, parcels up to a maximum approved transport capacity of 32kg/70lbs. Flat area designed to hold load measures 10 5/8 inches at the widest point and 8 3/8" long. Foldable for easy transportation and storage. Windguard Auto Open Umbrella Automatic open canopy. Samsonite branded handle. 2 Sectioned color matched steel shaft. Teflon coated polyester Windguard canopy. 17" folded length. Combination and Key Locks Constructed with sturdy zinc alloy to withstand the rigors of baggage handling. Oversized, smooth-turning dials are easy to read and operate. Triple-dial mechanism sets and re-sets with hundreds of possible combinations for added convenience and protection. Distinct design and color make luggage easier to identify. 3 Dial Combination Straps Rugged ABS buckle is built to withstand the rigors or baggage handling. Triple-dial mechanism sets and re-sets with hundreds of possible combination for added convenience and protection. Ultra-rugged polypropylene straps adjusts to fit bags up to 72". Distance design and color make luggage easier to identify.

Packing Cubes • Includes three sizes to hold all of your travel essentials Zipper closure keeps contents secure Mesh top panel for easy identification of belongings Handle for easy carrying convenience Small size is great for socks and undergarments Medium size works well for T-shirts and socks Large size fits jeans and tops Toiletry Kit Internal packing compartments.internal Wetpak pockets. Side water bottle pockets. Removable 3-1-1 pouch. Hanging feature with zip bottom for easy hanging access. Power Adapter Have access to power outlets in 150 countries. Fits outlets in Australia, China, United States, Europe and the UK. Sleek compact design allows this unique universal adapter to stow easily in smaller compartments and maximize packing space. Luggage Scale Don't be charged for overweight luggage again! Compact and portable luggage scale registers up to 80lbs. Comfort-grip handle and adjustable strap make weighing simple and comfortable. Built in tape-measure helps to ensure that bag is not over size.

About Samsonite Samsonite’s not just in the business of making luggage, we’re in the business of building confidence. Confidence that when you step off the curb, your luggage wheel isn't going to pop off. Confidence that if you put your laptop in the bag in one piece, that’s the way it will come out. Samsonite has set an industry precedence by perfecting and innovating luggage, casual bags, backpacks, travel accessories, and now electronics carriers and laptop bags. Over one hundred years of reliability, durability, style and innovative functionality. If you are going to head out the door, do it with peace of mind. Because, life has a way of coming at you fast. Be ready for anywhere.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This fits our luggage perfectly. I love that it protects our hard sided luggage as the airlines are pretty hard on luggage. I sure can spot my luggage a mile away and that makes it easy for pick up. Super happy with this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 8, 2022
reviews.reviewText: The product is of very good quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Ordered 2pcs but only 1 arrived
reviews.reviewText: Was excited about this product only to found out that I only received 1 pc.The fabric was not good either.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 11, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Careful with measuring and size !
reviews.reviewText: I love the idea but ,my suitcase case dimensions is approx 11.5 \ 19 \ 27 ( without wheels) in didn’t fit at all ( cover only 3/4 of it) , had to return and order L size , I hope it’s will fit much Better , otherwise great product !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 5, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits perfectly and it easy to spot at luggage collection
reviews.reviewText: I bought one of these a year or two ago and decided to invest in more for my Samsonite luggage. They fit really well and stay secure and are really easy to spot your luggage. I added a red name and address label to my suitcase in the off chance that someone had the same luggage covers as me on the flight!

reviews.reviewerName: Quiero regrear el paquete mándeme el código para regresarlo Quiero regrear el paquete mándeme el código para regresarlo
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 3, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on August 27, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Tip for extra security protection of your luggage.
reviews.reviewText: It fits my 62 inch Samsonite Sphere luggage too short. The velcro at the bottom does NOT make me feel secure so I wrap it round and round with Mueller EZ-Wrap Plastic Film w/Handle - Each (4 in X 1000 ft roll) sold here on Amazon.com. Otherwise I will use what has worked in the past: Saran Wrap and mailing tape.Wrap it sideways and up and down. Google OPEN LUGGAGE PEN and see how the luggage thieves around the world break into your luggage. Might add another layer of security by making a thin steel cable from Home Depot and making two loops at the ends. String through all your clothes and lock it with a NON-TSA lock and then throw the bundle into your luggage. Take all other items and put them into ziplock bags of all sizes and STAPLE them before you TAPE them shut. I never carry my cash, computer, cameras, or other valuables in Check-In. NEVER EVER bring your fancy rings or wedding rings and such on your vacations. Always carry traveler's checks and a few dollar bills you can afford to lose. I try NEVER to use my credit cards even though I carry them with me. There have been stories where a crooked store or hotel will take your card away to another room to ring up a sale. Later on you discover they made a second LARGER charge which you will discover after you get home and receive the credit card bill. Always carry them in my carry-on even if I have to carry two more backpacks. The airlines don't say anything.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: La maleta estuvo protegida todo el tiempi
This is the best cover for my new suitcase, went to 3 different countries without scratch
Llegó muy rápido y tiene muy buena calidad. Lo tuve que regresar por que mi maleta resultó muy chica para el tamaño.

When we first received it wasn’t sure if this is good quality.But we have travelled twice this year and has protected the newly bought luggage .Fully satisfied it has lot of flexibility which makes it easier to put it on and remove it .
Pues mi hija compró la L y se la pedí prestada y se abría y ahora ofrecen XL y me encantó, la tela, le queda perfecta, el estampado y sobre todo, el acabado
